channel.title: How can i make pvp tokens drop?
channel.description:
hello, i am making a pure pvp server and i just wanted to know how can i make it so when you kill another person they drop a random amount of pvp tokens (from 1-10) so if you know please can you post on here.
THANKS[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 19, 2009, 12:21:11 pm[/size][hr]any 1??
